mcq.statement: Which countries were the five founding members of OPEC?

options.a: Iran, Iraq, Kuwait, Saudi Arabia, and Venezuela
options.b: Iran, Iraq, Qatar, UAE, and Venezuela
options.c: Saudi Arabia, UAE, Kuwait, Iran, and Libya

mcq.one_liner: The five founding members of OPEC are **Iran, Iraq, Kuwait, Saudi Arabia, and Venezuela**.
